title: Fever!
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Hey, Nozomi. Have you seen the weather forecast for today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hm? It’s supposed to be pretty hot out~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I see. Then, let’s shorten our running distance today and cancel practice on the rooftop. There’s no shade there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Alright. We have to be careful, after all. Ah, why don’t we ask if we could use the area behind the shrine? There should be adequate shade and a nice breeze there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Oh, really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>As long as we don’t bother anyone coming to the shrine to pray, it should be fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Okay, let’s ask them then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eli-chi, you’re also changing the training schedule and making it appropriate for the weather, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Obviously. We have to put on performances that Aqours and Nijigasaki will look up to.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, I’ll leave it to you then. With your fever, everything will go swimmingly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
